title: Plum baba with crème fraîche ice cream
description: Babas are having a revival – this version replaces the rum with hazelnut liqueur and is served with grilled plums and plum purée.Equipment and Preparation: You will need an ice cream machine, large food processor with a dough attachment, a piping bag with a plain nozzle and 4 x 11cm/4½in baba tins (savarin moulds) - alternatively you can use small dariole moulds.
